en.description: A Battle Avionics that releases a volley of homing missiles at the cost of 100 flux energy. these missiles can make short work of fighters and ramsleds outside of the veil, but deal negligible damage to crewships regardless of their level. damage increases with the warhead avionic, but not with upgraded mki, mkii, mkiii rockets. drops from kosma cutter (earth) and elite exo cutter (veil)
